DESCRIPTION: Centurion Energy may only be spent on Centurion cards.
Mystic Energy may only be spent on Mystic cards.
Your next #yBlock gaining card gains additional #yBlock.
Exposed creatures take more damage from Attacks this turn.
Staggered creatures deal less damage with Attacks this turn.
Add an extra effect onto a card this combat.
Consumes all #yTemporary #yHP to raise its damage and #yBlock for the rest of combat.
Deals additional damage equal to your #yCoil.
Look at X random cards in your draw pile. You may add one of them to your hand.
Put a card of a certain type from your draw pile in your hand. If your draw pile contains no card of that type, put a random card of that type from your discard pile to your hand.
#yExhaust a card in your hand. If you do, draw a card.
Venom is spent to increase unblocked damage received, up to twice the original damage.
Your next Attack receives an additional effect.
This #yInfusion applies #yVenom equal to #b25% of unblocked damage dealt per stack. Venom is spent to increase unblocked damage received, up to twice the original damage.
This #yInfusion applies #yPoison equal to #b25% of unblocked damage dealt per stack. Poisoned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Poison is reduced by #b1.
This #yInfusion provides #yTemporary #yHP equal to #b25% of unblocked damage dealt per stack. Temporary HP disappears at the end of combat.
This #yInfusion makes your next Attack deal #b25% additional damage per stack.

Start a #yCombo. Whenever you play a card during a #yCombo, gain #yVigor equal to the number of cards played during this #yCombo. Ends at the end of your turn or if you play two cards of the same energy type in a row.

Whenever you play a card during a #yCombo, gain #yVigor equal to the number of cards played during this #yCombo. Ends at the end of your turn or if you play two cards of the same energy type in a row.
